channel.title: Glory of War (WIP) (Online Multiplayer Shooter)
channel.description:
[ul][center][size=18pt][u][b]Glory of War[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][b]Not Started - Started - Complete[/b][/center] [center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img855/7413/f8k2.png[/img][/center]
[b]Our Server Specs:[/b] CPU - 3.4Ghz Quadcore RAM - 32GB HDD - 120GB SSD Bandwidth - 15TB
[b]Introduction:[/b] Glory of War will be an intense, online multiplayer shooter. Imagine huge maps, vehicles, objectives, and plenty of action with matches of 12v12! Imagine Battlefield 4, top down, 2.5D.
[b]Classes:[/b] [list] [li]Assault[/li][/list] - Medic [list][li]Engineer[/li][/list] - Vehicle Repair [list][li]Support[/li][/list] - Ammunition Supply [list][li]Recon[/li][/list] - Long Distance[/ul]
[b]Weapons - Assault:[/b] These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed. AK-47 AUG Famas Galil M4A1
[b]Weapons - Engineer:[/b] These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed. UMP45 TMPS P90 FNF2000 MAC10 MP5
[b]Weapons - Support:[/b] These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed. SG552 SG550 XM1014 M3 M249
[b]Weapons - Recon:[/b] These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed. AWP Scout GS3G1
[b]Weapons - Secondary (All Classes):[/b] These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed. DEagle Elite Five-Seven Glock P228 USP
[b]Vehicles - Land:[/b] Jeep Tank Dirtbike
[b]Vehicles - Air:[/b] Jet Helicopter
[b]Vehicles - Sea:[/b] Speed Boat Jetski
[b]Platforms:[/b] Xbox 360 Windows 8 PC
[b]Developers:[/b] Jordan Hunt (C#) Sean Hickey (C#) Shon Heidrich(C#)
Kirk Grier (Game Art) Matt Douglas (Game Art)
Stevie/Heather Gash (Music/Sounds)
[b]Gallery:[/b] This is what we have so far. All it is, is the menu music and the client connecting to the server then a blank screen. The blank screen is actually a login/register screen now I just haven't updated the video.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jSWSMFKSU3k[/youtube]
Here are all the weapons as they will appear on the class creation screen:
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img835/7717/ditl.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img534/497/am8n.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img823/8972/nfkn.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img812/7370/fbpf.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img199/6421/mc93.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img854/642/nj4i.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img824/115/964v.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img203/5453/0eft.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img716/8373/0qiw.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img89/9712/agoy.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img163/5331/x5uv.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img35/4092/fl8w.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img35/208/s28z.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img839/4705/wwpn.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img18/66/6da1.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img41/7089/l89a.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img827/2979/ub5p.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img27/9315/ppod.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img208/8760/bszg.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img809/6373/n0mx.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img19/3770/zxlh.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img822/4023/3z7x.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img600/8530/74e6.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img198/8455/x0ty.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img31/6485/uszv.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img600/8530/74e6.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img198/8455/x0ty.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img594/698/xe16.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img802/2805/utky.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img24/702/52b5.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img41/9292/8l51.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img600/1363/gxw7.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img845/8195/jmtd.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img199/1732/pofd.png[/img]

item.title: Glory of War (WIP) (Online Multiplayer Shooter)
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“Jordan Hunt, post:10, topic:540546”][quote author=Tree link=topic=659409.msg4409916#msg4409916 date=1393230815]
The biggest mistake that I see people make is that they fail to properly plan their project. Figure out a budget and place that money into a separate bank account. You want to treat the project as a separate entity and generally not add any of your own income into that account after the initial funding. It’ll make the stress a little more bearable and you’re not going to dig too deep into your own pocket.

Secondly, figure out a way to monetize the idea before you release the game. If the project fails or runs short on funds, then it’s generally a good idea to abandon the project and focus on getting a solid paycheck again. When you feel as though you have enough saved up to finish your project, continue onwards or start a new project with better budgeting.

This is awesome!

I can’t think of anything worse than getting yourself into debt or stressing yourself out over a project. Assume the idea will fail and the savings that you’re throwing into the idea is simply buying you the time to develop something.
[/quote]wow never thought of it that way. Thanks for the insight.

Finished 2 models for some of the aircraft let me know what you guys think:

[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:9, topic:540546”]The biggest mistake that I see people make is that they fail to properly plan their project. Figure out a budget and place that money into a separate bank account. You want to treat the project as a separate entity and generally not add any of your own income into that account after the initial funding. It’ll make the stress a little more bearable and you’re not going to dig too deep into your own pocket.

Secondly, figure out a way to monetize the idea before you release the game. If the project fails or runs short on funds, then it’s generally a good idea to abandon the project and focus on getting a solid paycheck again. When you feel as though you have enough saved up to finish your project, continue onwards or start a new project with better budgeting.

I can’t think of anything worse than getting yourself into debt or stressing yourself out over a project. Assume the idea will fail and the savings that you’re throwing into the idea is simply buying you the time to develop something.[/quote]wow never thought of it that way. Thanks for the insight.

Finished 2 models for some of the aircraft let me know what you guys think:

item.title: Glory of War (WIP) (Online Multiplayer Shooter)
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

The biggest mistake that I see people make is that they fail to properly plan their project. Figure out a budget and place that money into a separate bank account. You want to treat the project as a separate entity and generally not add any of your own income into that account after the initial funding. It’ll make the stress a little more bearable and you’re not going to dig too deep into your own pocket.

Secondly, figure out a way to monetize the idea before you release the game. If the project fails or runs short on funds, then it’s generally a good idea to abandon the project and focus on getting a solid paycheck again. When you feel as though you have enough saved up to finish your project, continue onwards or start a new project with better budgeting.

I can’t think of anything worse than getting yourself into debt or stressing yourself out over a project. Assume the idea will fail and the savings that you’re throwing into the idea is simply buying you the time to develop something.

Read full topic

item.title: Glory of War (WIP) (Online Multiplayer Shooter)
item.dc:creator: @Jordan_Hunt Jordan Hunt
item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:7, topic:540546”]With Xbox Indie you can release games on their store for a 99 dollars per year subscription. This allows:

  • Submit up to 10 games on Xbox LIVE Indie Games
  • Develop and debug on your retail Xbox 360 console with XNA Game Studio Connect
  • Customize your games for individual regions and languages
  • Peer review new Indie Games before they’re released

SOURCE: http://xbox.create.msdn.com/en-US/home/membership[/quote]Yeah its the same price for windows 8 as well. Those I didn’t mind paying, but the server is pretty expensive. $189/m. I’ve paid for 6 months so hopefully the game works out.

Read full topic

item.title: Glory of War (WIP) (Online Multiplayer Shooter)
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

With Xbox Indie you can release games on their store for a 99 dollars per year subscription. This allows:

  • Submit up to 10 games on Xbox LIVE Indie Games
  • Develop and debug on your retail Xbox 360 console with XNA Game Studio Connect
  • Customize your games for individual regions and languages
  • Peer review new Indie Games before they’re released

SOURCE: http://xbox.create.msdn.com/en-US/home/membership

item.title: Glory of War (WIP) (Online Multiplayer Shooter)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:5, topic:540546”][quote author=Jordan Hunt link=topic=659409.msg4409859#msg4409859 date=1393208721]
I say in the OP I’m using c#. I’m using the xna framework. I plan on releasing the game for Xbox 360 and window 8 platforms.
[/quote]

U know how hard it is to make a game work with the xbox, it can’t just be an Independent game.[/quote]The XNA framework has inbuilt support to run on either Windows or Xbox - he can probably easily port it to MonoGame (unofficial open-source continuation of the now deprecated XNA framework) and have it run on Linux too. He will just have to pay a fee (iirc) to have his game put on the xbox store.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Jordan_Hunt Jordan Hunt
item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

[ul][center][size=18pt]Glory of War[/size][/center]
[center]Not Started - Started - Complete[/center]
[center][/center]

Our Server Specs:
CPU - 3.4Ghz Quadcore
RAM - 32GB
HDD - 120GB SSD
Bandwidth - 15TB

Introduction:
Glory of War will be an intense, online multiplayer shooter. Imagine huge maps, vehicles, objectives, and plenty of action with matches of 12v12! Imagine Battlefield 4, top down, 2.5D.

Classes:
[list]
[li]Assault[/li][/list] - Medic
[list][li]Engineer[/li][/list] - Vehicle Repair
[list][li]Support[/li][/list] - Ammunition Supply
[list][li]Recon[/li][/list] - Long Distance[/ul]

Weapons - Assault:
These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed.
AK-47
AUG
Famas
Galil
M4A1

Weapons - Engineer:
These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed.
UMP45
TMPS
P90
FNF2000

MP5

These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed.
SG552
SG550
XM1014
M3
M249

Weapons - Recon:
These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed.

Scout
GS3G1

These are just what I have so far. More are being created and developed.
DEagle
Elite
Five-Seven

Vehicles - Land:

Windows 8 PC
